name: Oasis Network
intro: Decentralized Layer1 network based on PoS consensus
introduce:
The Oasis Network is a Layer 1, proof-of-stake, decentralized network. Designed to support the next generation of blockchain applications, the Oasis Network is incredibly versatile, agile, and customizable.
The Oasis Network supports confidential smart contracts — allowing sensitive data to be used by Dapps and unlocking new use cases and applications of blockchain technology.
